methods.name: emerald_heartbeat
methods.summary: Check service health

methods.name: emerald_currentVersion
methods.summary: Check service health

methods.name: emerald_listAccounts
methods.summary: Return the list of all not hidden (by default) accounts from the keystore

params.name: chain
params.description: Chain name, by default `mainnet`, other possible variant `morden`

params.name: chain_id
params.description: chain id number, by default for `mainnet` it equals `61`

result.description: List of all not hidden accounts

methods.name: emerald_hideAccount
methods.summary: Hide an account from the list returned by default by `emerald_listAccounts`

params.name: chain
params.description: chain name, by default `mainnet`, other possible variant `morden`

params.name: chain_id
params.description: chain id number, by default for `mainnet` it equals `61`

methods.name: emerald_unhideAccount
methods.summary: Show an account that was hidden before by the command `emerald_hideAccount`

params.name: chain
params.description: chain name, by default `mainnet`, other possible variant `morden`

params.name: chain_id
params.description: chain id number, by default for `mainnet` it equals `61`

methods.name: emerald_newAccount
methods.summary: Creates a new account and stores it locally as a passphrase-encoded keystore file.

methods.name: emerald_shakeAccount
methods.summary: Recreate account with the same public address, but with a different passphrase

methods.name: emerald_updateAccount
methods.summary: Update not secured by passphrase account metadata, like `name` and `description`

methods.name: emerald_importAccount
methods.summary: Import a new account from an external keyfile. Handle both cases: normal account & HD wallet account

methods.name: emerald_exportAccount
methods.summary: Returns an account keyfile associated with the account.

methods.name: emerald_generateMnemonic
methods.summary: Generates a new 24 words long mnemonic phrase

methods.name: emerald_importMnemonic
methods.summary: Creates a new account from a mnemonic and stores it locally as a passphrase-encoded keystore file

methods.name: emerald_signTransaction
methods.summary:
Signs transaction offline with private key from keystore file with given passphrase.
        If `function` and `arguments` are provided, they will be encoded according smart contract ABI 
        and used in the `data` field of the transaction

methods.name: emerald_listContracts
methods.summary: Return the list of all not hidden (by default) smart contracts from the local storage

methods.name: emerald_hideContract
methods.summary: Hide a smart contract from the list returned by default by `emerald_listContracts`

methods.name: emerald_unhideContract
methods.summary: Show a smart contract that was hidden before by the command `emerald_hideContract`

methods.name: emerald_updateContract
methods.summary:
Update contract metadata. Contract address and chain information 
        are used to identify the contract, and may not be updated.

methods.name: emerald_importContract
methods.summary: Import a new smart contract Application Binary Interface (ABI) locally

methods.name: emerald_exportContract
methods.summary: Returns contract object associated with the contract

methods.name: emerald_importAddress
methods.summary: Add new contact into address book

methods.name: emerald_listAddresses
methods.summary: Return all addresses for particular chain
